incomeTaxes.name: UK Income Tax (Standard)
incomeTaxes.notes: Tax year 2023/24. Personal Allowance reduces by £1 for every £2 earned over £100,000. Scotland has different rates.

incomeTaxes.name: Scottish Income Tax
incomeTaxes.notes: Tax year 2023/24. Applies to Scottish residents only. Personal Allowance same as rest of UK.

wealthTaxes.name: UK Wealth Tax
wealthTaxes.notes: The UK does not have a general wealth tax. Property taxes (Council Tax) and inheritance tax exist separately.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Capital Gains Tax (Basic Rate)
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: Tax year 2023/24. Basic rate taxpayers pay 10% on gains from most assets and 18% on residential property. Annual exempt amount is £6,000.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Capital Gains Tax (Higher Rate)
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: Tax year 2023/24. Higher/additional rate taxpayers pay 20% on gains from most assets and 28% on residential property.
